column4: Hello was curious if anyone can tell me how much trouble I am in if I am seeing "<0>Kernal panic - not syncing: Attempted to kill init!"

how many cd-rom drives do you have in your home or apartment?

They work fine on this pc

k never used amd and linux together
if it can't find the root fs...
